target.name: extract_internal
target.description: Extract non-core internal packages

target.name: extract_external
target.description: Extract contributed packages

target.name: compile_tests_internal
target.description: Compile tests for a named internal package (run with -DpackageName=package name)

target.name: compile_internal
target.description: Compile a named internal package (run with -DpackageName=package name)

target.name: make_internal
target.description: Make a named internal package - compiles, generates javadoc and creates the zip file (run with -DpackageName=package name)

target.name: apply_all_internal
target.description: Apply command to all internal packages. Use -DpackageCommand=[make|compile|compile_tests]

target.name: compile_tests_external
target.description: Compile tests for a named external package (run with -DpackageName=package name)

target.name: compile_external
target.description: Compile a named external package (run with -DpackageName=package name)

target.name: make_external
target.description: Make a named external package - compiles, generates javadoc and creates the zip file (run with -DpackageName=package name)

target.name: apply_all_external
target.description: Apply command to all external packages. Use -DpackageCommand=[make|compile|compile_tests]

target.name: apply_all
target.description: Apply command to all packages. Use -DpackageCommand=[make|compile|compile_tests]

target.name: compile
target.description: Compile weka and deposit class files in build/classes

target.name: docs
target.description: Make javadocs into ./doc

replace.value: Help  Weka's home

target.name: compile_tests
target.description: Compile unit tests into build/testcases

target.name: jar_tests
target.description: Creates a jar file with the test cases in ./dist

target.name: run_tests_core
target.description: Execute unit tests (fast)

target.name: run_tests_all
target.description: Execute unit tests (fast)

target.name: junit
target.description: Execute unit tests and produce html summary (in ./reports)

target.name: exejar
target.description: Create an executable jar file in ./dist

target.name: srcjar
target.description: Create a jar file containing weka source in ./dist

target.name: remotejar
target.description: Create a jar file containing classes for remote experiments in ./dist

target.name: release
target.description: Make a release in ${release}. Run with -Drelease=<number of release (eg. 3-4-1)>.

target.name: release_no_junit
target.description: Make a release in ${release} without running junit tests. Run with -Drelease=<number of release (eg. 3-4-1)>.

target.name: release_sub_tasks
target.depends: set_version, exejar, remotejar, srcjar, docs, changelog

target.name: osx_application
target.description: Make an OS X application. Run with -Drelease=<number of release (eg. 3-4-1)>. Assumes a release target has been run first!

target.name: svnCheckout
target.description: Checkout from subversion. Run with -Dsvn_username=username -Dsvn_password=password -Dweka_branch=<branch name (e.g. trunk, branches/book2ndEd-branch)>.

target.name: changelog
target.description: Create a changelog file for a release of Weka. Run with -Dsvn_username=username -Dsvn_password=password -Drelease=<number of release (eg. 3-4-1)>, -Ddate_range=<date range for changes (eg. {2008-07-16}:{2008-09-29})>, -Dweka_branch=<branch name (e.g. trunk, branches/book2ndEd-branch)>.

target.name: nightly_build
target.description: Does a svn checkout, builds, runs unit tests, and mails the output to mail recipients (run ant with -Dsvn_username=username -Dsvn_password=password -Dweka_branch=branch -Dmail_recipients=<email,email,...> -Dmail_sender=email -Dmail_smtp_host=smtp-server)

target.name: clean
target.description: Removes the build, dist and reports directories

target.name: superclean
target.description: Clean plus removes source trees! and doc directories
